title: Action Bronson and Friends Watch Ancient Aliens
resume: Following the success of his 4/20 special, Traveling the Stars: Ancient Aliens with Action Bronson and Friends, Bronson and co-host The Alchemist are back combining their two favorite things: the hit HISTORY series "Ancient Aliens" and smoking weed. Joined by his producers, friends, and special guests, Bronson will watch, comment on, and give the highest praise to some of the series' most iconic episodes.

View All Seasons Social Reviews  1 Discussions  0 A review by Bricktop  1.0 Written by  Bricktop  on January  2, 2018 Just watched a random episode of this. Wow. It's literally just the full episode of Ancient Aliens in the background with superimposed Bronson & crew smoking, eating, getting shaved and talking about things trivial and unrelated. I would rather watch static than this horrible shit even though I like Ancient Aliens and Action Bronson and weed for that matter. These things just don't stack up to anything at all. Half a star seems like a generous donation. Easily the single worst video I've ever seen and I've seen two girls, one cup. At least that video had an idea.
